full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@034B JI LTAR SNGON GYI BDE SHEGS KYIS, ,SEMS CAN KUN GYI DON GYI PHYIR, ,BYANG CHUB CHOS KUN RDZOGS PA DANG, ,BLA MED BYANG CHUB THOB BYA'I PHYIR, ,GSO SBYONG NGES PAR MDZAD PA LTAR,]
